page.title: 04EDUCATION
page.content: The area is served by a comprehensive school,two primary schools and a first school.Heathlands is a first and has 75 on roll.Python Hill Primary School, which opened in 1924,has 270 pupils on roll.It serves the older housing area along the A617 between Rainworth and the White Post.Lake View Primary School,which was opened in 1966,has 258 pupils on roll,including 80 in the nursery.Joseph Whitaker School(named after a local naturalist) was opened in 1963 as a non-selective school,serving Blidworth,Rainworth and Ravenshead.In 1971 it was reorganised as a comprehensive school.The school, which caters for 11 to 18 year olds is an eight-form entry and has approximately 1250 on roll.
